main.description: List plans. Filterable by: planIncludes, hasIndependentDemand.

uri.description: Fetch a single record by AT-URI. Other filters are ignored when set.

planIncludes.description: Filter where planIncludes array contains this AT-URI.

hasIndependentDemand.description: Filter where hasIndependentDemand array contains this AT-URI.

limit.description: Maximum number of records to return.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor from a previous response.
